Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 1 -- 8.52 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 8.52 mills property tax renewal for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment, including the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, and all purposes incidental thereto.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Iberia, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy an eight and fifty-two hundredths (8.52) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $2,330,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment, including the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, and all purposes incidental thereto?
